Name: Dark Desire 1
About the game: Dark Desire This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. The game is in FULL HD (1080p) resolution and full of choices. The main focus is to create as many choices and paths as possible and let you guide the characters: depending on the choice you make, each character has love points or a relationship has blocking points. You can always view the status in the detailed BIO screen in the menu, including relationship status and partner. If all goes well, the plan is to release also DLCs, to use the Love Points and decisions and paths, to make it as dynamic as possible. A very optimistic plan is to have 50-80 episodes released in batches. The plan is to create some episodes at first and then see how the size affects the performance. EP01 - Shani and Ann (play as Shani or Ann or story mode) (if you play as Ann, Shani's actions are random, nice! :)) - AUDIO (narrator, Shani (2 voices) and Ann) EP02 - Ann and Shani EP03 - Cindy and Zac (play as Cindy (female) or Zac (male) and has alternative outfits for different parts) - AUDIO (Cindy POV and Zac) EP04 - The Path to Vengeance (Cindy 19 years old - continues from Midnight Stories) EP05 - Playing with Fire (Cindy 19 years old) EP06 - The Payment - AUDIO (narrator, Cindy, Reggie, Jeff, Amy, Tabitha and more!!!) * last 4 episodes cancelled as new paths have been added, also working on adding AUDIO (voice actors and sound) As of 23-APR-2022, the game contains 60 menus and 1041 images: AUDIO - sometimes even more voices for 1 character (you can choose) Love points and paths accessible based on that Music (with images, based on music selection) Menu (pause time, relationship and character info, jump, etc.) Weekly updates :) Episode 01 and 02 (in Cindy 23 universe) Play as Shani, Ann or story Path Dark Desire Shani Episode 03 (in Cindy 23 universe) Cindy or Zac POV Choose outfits for Cindy Path Dark Desire Cindy Path Dark Desire Zac Episode 04 (in Cindy 19 universe) Path Dark Desire Cindy - Drake and Mendez side story Path Dark Desire Reggie - feet fetish Path Dark Desire Cindy - rough or soft time with Kevin Episode 05 (in Cindy 19 universe) Path Dark Desire Cindy - the voyeur Path Dark Desire Reggie - bad bad girl EP06 - The Payment (in Cindy 19 universe) Cindy and Reggie Cindy and Michelle Jeff and Amy (2 positions / paths) Reggie and Tabitha (2 positions / paths)â€‹
